nodes.text: A mechanic was the owner and partner of the astromech droid T7-O1 sometime during T7-O1's two centuries of activity. The droid and mechanic eventually parted ways sometime before the beginning of the Great Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.

This mechanic was first mentioned by T7-O1, a companion character for the Jedi Knight class in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011. In the conversation "Master Zallow," T7-O1 names the mechanic as one of his twelve previous partners, though he does not specify the individual's name, species, or gender.
